name: Chocolaty Temptation Petites
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 350° F.  
  2. Place Perfect Petites on a Sheet Pan. Using a basting brush, generously brush with oil.  
  3. In a bowl, whisk together milk, oil, vinegar, and mix.  
  4. Evenly divide batter in Perfect Petites, about 1 tbsp per mold. Smooth tops. 
  5. Bake 20–22 min, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Rest in pan until cool to the touch, then pop out.
tips:
Top cooked petites with caramel or chocolate icing. Topping each petite with 1⁄2 tbsp icing is still a Good Food. Real Results. dessert! 

The 4-in-1 Spice Spoon is perfect for dividing the batter in the Perfect Petites; use the back of the spoon to gently smooth the top of the batter for even baking.

Make ahead and freeze. Remove from freezer 15 min prior to serving.
